bool CreateObject (GridRegion destination, ISceneObject sog)
 Create an object in the destination region. This message is used primarily for prim crossing.
bool CreateObject (GridRegion destination, UUID userID, UUID itemID)
 Create an object from the user's inventory in the destination region. This message is used primarily by clients for attachments.
bool FailedToMoveAgentIntoNewRegion (UUID AgentID, UUID RegionID)
 Tells the region that the agent was not able to leave the region and needs to be resumed.
ISimulationService GetInnerService ()
 Get the 'inner' simulation service. For the remote simulation service, this gives the local simulation service. For the local simulation service. this gives the same service as it is already the local service.
IScene GetScene (ulong regionHandle)
 Try to find a scene with the given region handle.
void Init (IScene scene)
 Add and set up the scene for the simulation module.
bool MakeChildAgent (UUID AgentID, GridRegion Region)
 Makes a root agent into a child agent in the given region DOES mark the agent as leaving (removes attachments among other things).
void RemoveScene (IScene scene)
 Remove the scene from the list of known scenes.
bool RetrieveAgent (GridRegion destination, UUID id, bool agentIsLeaving, out AgentData agent, out AgentCircuitData circuitData)
 Pull the root agent info from the given destination Grid Server only.
bool UpdateAgent (GridRegion destination, AgentPosition data)
 Short child agent update, mostly for position. Grid Server only.
bool UpdateAgent (GridRegion destination, AgentData data)
 Full child agent update. Grid Server only.

ISimulationService OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.ISimulationService.GetInnerService (  ) 

Get the 'inner' simulation service. For the remote simulation service, this gives the local simulation service. For the local simulation service. this gives the same service as it is already the local service.
